mapper.insert: insert into cafe_board_post_master(title, boardNo, userID, readCount, replyCount, noticeYN, createdDate ) values (#{title}, #{boardNo}, #{userID}, #{readCount}, #{replyCount}, #{noticeYN}, NOW());
